cause.description:
Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington is dedicated to promoting ethics and accountability in government and public life by targeting government officials -- regardless of party affiliation -- who sacrifice the common good to special interests. CREW advances its mission using a combination of research, litigation and media outreach. CREW employs the law as a tool to force officials to act ethically and lawfully and to bring unethical conduct to the public’s attention through:
* Litigation * Freedom of Information Act Requests * Ethics Complaints * Internal Revenue Service Complaints * Federal Election Commission Complaints * Requests for investigations
